site.title: MediaVault Pro
site.name: MediaVault Pro
site.description: Your personal video and media library organized beautifully

hero.subtitle: Capturing life's most important moments through cinematic storytelling

catalog.title: Featured Work
catalog.subtitle: A selection of my most recent and impactful visual stories
catalog.view_all_subtitle: Explore all videos with filters, search, and detailed descriptions

cinematic_landscapes.title: Mountain Escape
cinematic_landscapes.description: A personal project capturing the serene beauty of my weekend hiking trip to the Rocky Mountains. Shot with my drone during golden hour, this piece represents my love for nature photography and cinematography.

urban_timelapse.title: City Life Chronicles
urban_timelapse.description: My ongoing documentation of urban life in downtown. This timelapse compilation shows 6 months of capturing the same intersection at different times, revealing the rhythm of city life.

ocean_waves.title: Coastal Memories
ocean_waves.description: Summer vacation footage from my trip to the Pacific Coast. These intimate moments with the ocean waves remind me why I fell in love with videography - capturing fleeting beauty.

mountain_adventure.title: Alpine Adventure
mountain_adventure.description: Behind-the-scenes of my mountain climbing expedition. This personal documentary showcases not just the stunning landscapes, but the journey and challenges of outdoor photography.

forest_wildlife.title: Backyard Wildlife
forest_wildlife.description: A year-long project documenting the wildlife in my local forest preserve. Patient observation and respect for nature resulted in these intimate wildlife encounters.

sunset_magic.title: Golden Hour Collection
sunset_magic.description: My favorite sunset captures from various locations around the world. Each sunset tells a different story - from solo travels to family moments, all preserved in cinematic quality.

tech_innovation.title: Creative Process
tech_innovation.description: A behind-the-scenes look at my creative workflow, from planning shoots to post-production. This meta-project shows how I organize and manage my growing video library.

cultural_heritage.title: Family Heritage
cultural_heritage.description: Documenting my grandmother's stories and our family traditions. This ongoing project preserves precious memories and cultural heritage for future generations.

extreme_sports.title: Weekend Warriors
extreme_sports.description: Action footage from my friends' extreme sports adventures. From skateboarding to rock climbing, these videos capture the adrenaline and friendship of our weekend escapades.

wedding_moments.title: Wedding Memories
wedding_moments.description: Intimate wedding cinematography capturing the most precious moments of couples' special days. Each story is unique and beautifully personal.

startup_story.title: Startup Journey
startup_story.description: Following the entrepreneurial journey of a Boulder-based tech startup from concept to launch. A documentary-style exploration of modern business.

adventure_hiking.title: Mountain Adventures
adventure_hiking.description: Epic hiking adventures through Colorado's most challenging trails. These videos capture both the struggle and triumph of conquering nature's obstacles.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Visual Storyteller & Creative
about.description: Hi! I'm Alex, a visual storyteller and creative based in Colorado. For the past 8 years, I've been exploring the world through my lens, capturing moments that speak to the human experience - from quiet contemplative scenes to dynamic urban landscapes.
about.mission: My journey started with curiosity and a simple camera. What began as personal documentation has evolved into a passion for visual narrative. I'm drawn to authentic moments, experimental techniques, and collaborative projects that push creative boundaries.
about.experience: I've collaborated with fellow artists, documented cultural events, and created experimental pieces that explore the intersection of technology and art. Each project is an opportunity to learn, grow, and connect with others who share a passion for visual storytelling.
about.approach: My approach is intuitive: observe, connect, and create. I believe the most powerful visuals emerge from genuine moments and authentic collaboration with others.

photography.title: Photography
photography.description: Exploring light, composition, and moment through still imagery. From street photography to conceptual portraits.

videography.title: Videography
videography.description: Creating moving narratives that capture emotion and atmosphere. Experimental techniques and traditional storytelling.

documentary.title: Documentary
documentary.description: Documenting real stories and authentic moments. Interested in cultural narratives and personal journeys.

experimental.title: Experimental Art
experimental.description: Pushing boundaries with new techniques, mixed media, and unconventional approaches to visual storytelling.

collaboration.title: Creative Collaborations
collaboration.description: Always open to working with fellow artists, musicians, and creatives on unique interdisciplinary projects.

equipment.title: Tools & Techniques
equipment.description: Constantly exploring new equipment and techniques to expand creative possibilities and visual expression.

contact.title: Let's Collaborate
contact.subtitle: Work With Me
contact.description: I'm always open to collaborating with fellow creatives, artists, and anyone with interesting visual stories to tell.
contact.info: Whether you have a creative concept, need someone to document your art, or want to collaborate on a visual project, I'd love to hear from you. Let's create something meaningful together.

collaboration.title: Open to Collaboration
collaboration.photography_desc: Collaborative photo shoots, artistic concepts, and visual storytelling projects.
collaboration.video_desc: Experimental videos, documentaries, and creative visual narratives.
collaboration.creative_desc: Interdisciplinary projects combining visual media with other art forms.

video_page.video_description: A personal project capturing the serene beauty of my weekend hiking trip to the Rocky Mountains. Shot with my drone during golden hour, this piece represents my love for nature photography and cinematography. This is one of my favorite personal moments - the peaceful silence of the mountains at sunset.
